item.title: Music
item.description: I have been singing Hindustani (North Indian) Classical vocal music for the past 15 years. I also play the guitar, ukulele, and tabla. More coming soon.

item.title: Projects
item.description: Projects Some stuff I'm working on currently and have worked on in the past

item.title: Research
item.description: The majority of my work has been in Clinical Natural Language Processing. The overarching theme of my research under Dr. Chitta Baral has been to leverage NLP across biomedical & clinical data (like Electronic Medical Records) to make actionable decisions that improve efficiency of healthcare delivery. Below are a few of the things I've worked on. There are also more details on Google Scholar or my LinkedIn.
